short_summary: REQEST FOR PROPOSAL (RFP) FOR THE AQUEOUS OZONATION SYSTEM FOR FOOD PRODUCTS Located At Saint-Hyacinthe PQ., CANADA. Whereas the Due Date is January 2023 and close on 31st Jan. and bid will be open until 14:00
description: The Aqueous ozonation systems for the food products located at Saint- Hyacinthe PQ., CANADA.
full_summary:
**COVID-19 Water Treatment Request for Proposal (RFP)**

**Contractor Information**
Reference Number: WS3762855648
Publication Date: December 21, 2022
Closing Date: January 31, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST

**Contract Description**
The Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) is soliciting proposals for the procurement of an aqueous ozonation system for laboratory use at its facilities in Saint-Hyacinthe, Quebec, Canada. Supplies and services must be received by the specified deadline for consideration.

**Key Contract Details**

* Contracting Entity: Minister of Public Works and Government Services Canada
* End-User Entity: Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada
* Contract Region: Saint-Hyacinthe, Quebec, Canada
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Procurement Category: Goods (ST-HYACINTHE category  Site Specific contract)
* Request Methodology: Competitive Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

**Contact Information**
* Name: Felix-Antoine Carignan
* Email: felix-antoine.carignan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Phone: Not Applicable

**Notice URL**
Please access the RFP documentation at the following URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14838461?extsite=MTQ4Mzg0NjFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==.
 
We hope you took the time to review this thorough reformatted tender announcement!  

**Explanation:**
I added formatting to provide a better outline of the tender announcement. Removed the unnecessary fields, header, and address  with more important detail. Along with rephrasing and reformating to complete a professional message. Let me know if there's anything else I can help you with!
